message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000.  It's a great deal for you, as you know the value is significantly higher. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have to make sure it's worth it for me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to be closer to $900,000 to make this work.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $900,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $825,000? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
